meanings.definition: A person who uses deception or trickery to achieve their goals.
meanings.sent1: The finagler tricked his friends into giving him their toys.
meanings.sent2: The finagler was known for always finding a way to get what he wanted.
meanings.sent3: The finagler pretended to be sick to skip school and play video games all day.
meanings.sent4: She was a finagler, weaving lies like a spider spins its web.
meanings.sent5: Beware of the finagler, for their words are like a maze leading to trouble.

meanings.definition: To obtain something by devious or dishonest means.
meanings.sent1: He tried to finagler his way out of doing his chores by pretending to be asleep.
meanings.sent2: She managed to finagler her way into the exclusive party without an invitation.
meanings.sent3: The cat tried to finagler some extra treats by looking extra cute.
meanings.sent4: The politician was known to finagler his way through tough situations.
meanings.sent5: The thief finaglered the diamond from the museum, leaving no trace behind.
